page.title: 16CHANGING FACE OF FARMING 3
page.content: THATCHING THE STRAW BALES IS NO LONGER NECESSARY.FARMERS USED TO KEEP FEW ACCOUNTS LIVING FROM HAND TO MOUTH. NOW BECAUSE OF VAT FULL ACCOUNTS HAVE TO BE KEPT AND MOST LANG FARMS EMPLOY A SECRETARY TO LOOK AFTER THIS SIDE OF THE BUSINESS. IN CONCLUSION THE MODERN FARM WORKER NEEDS TO BE A HIGHLY SKILLED TECHNICIAN ABLE TO COPE WITH THE DEMANDS THAT NEW FARM MACHINERY BRINGS. IT IS SAD TO SAY THAT NEW METHODS HAVE SEEN A DECLINE IN THE FARMING COMMUNITY,LOW WAGES HAVE NOT HELPED EITHER IN AN DECLINING NEED OF MAN POWER. WHOLE FAMILIES HAVE MOVED OUT OF THE HAMLETS TO THE TOWN
